title: (BONUS EP) Double Jeopardy
description: This month, the gals examine a very distinct courtroom loophole. Topics include lives and limbs, some tricky tapes, and the true size of a phonograph. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Matchlock Cabernet, consult a lawyer, and tune in for Double Jeopardy. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
